title: FPS Problems for many people NOT snowdown or any of the common problems
body:
There was a thread stickied earlier about the massive framerate issues ever since preseason (and PBE, but I think people just thought it was performing badly because of it being PBE). The framerate overall has dropped to unplayable, especially in teamfights. It's still fine on startup and during some laning but it eventually becomes very detrimental to gameplay.

It has also become clear that this isn't solved by any of the classic fixes like going through the fps troubleshooting or the hextech repair tool, or updating drivers, or reinstalling, turning off snowdown stuff... none of it works, the problem is somewhere in the preseason update.

So why was this thread unstickied? The problem is not solved as far as I'm aware and a lot of players are experiencing it.

Are there ANY updates at all on the progress?

 I've been forced to not play my main Xerath because his skillshot oriented kit is difficult to pull off, and even more difficult to have fun with at low framerates for over a month now.

Any updates would be greatly appreciated

replies.body:
I noticed myself that FPS thread was updated with 7.22 and 7.23, but it seemed like the issues persisted into 7.24 as well. Since that thread was specific to those patches, I think that's why it was taken down. 

Since it sounds like you've already tried most of the basic troubleshooting, go ahead and gather those game logs you can generate using the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and send them over to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They can sift through those logs to see exactly what's going wrong to cause those fps drops.
